snippet: Despite having had four of the team’s five starters miss games due to injury, the Chicago Bulls have chugged along as the best team in the Eastern Conference.
abstract: Despite having had four of the team’s five starters miss games due to injury, the Chicago Bulls have chugged along as the best team in the Eastern Conference.

headline.main: Long Bench Has Served Bulls Well
headline.print_headline: Long Bench Has Served Bulls Well in a Shortened Season
